bibdata.title: American National Standard Guide for Electromagnetic Compatibility&#8212;Computations and Treatment of Measurement Uncertainty
American National Standard Guide for Electromagnetic Compatibility&#8212;Computations and Treatment of Measurement Uncertainty

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Methods for estimating measurement uncertainty of emissions measurement results are provided, for use in conjunction with the basic methods of ANSI C63.4. Included in this document are both Type A and Type B uncertainty evaluation methods.

Methods for estimating measurement uncertainty of emissions measurement results are provided, for use in conjunction with the basic methods of ANSI C63.4. Included in this document are both Type A and Type B uncertainty evaluation methods.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
